title: Crown Of Smoke
description: A Life BoundA Destiny RevealedA Vengeance UnleashedDream Guardian, Vaughn Khale is on the brink of gaining his redemption to claim the demon crown of Lucidity, when his world is set ablaze. Deception fractures his life of duty and honor, altering his younger brotherâ€™s fate forever. Pragmatic. Archeology student. Angel Marked. Lila Vanderhook leads a normal 22 year old life, until her nightmares attack her in the flesh. Her brush with an ancient relic has ancient demons hunting her and she must flee to save herself.The decision has grave consequences for her guardian, revealing a destiny neither of them are prepared for.
author: Snowa Fox
